member.name: T:Hyre.Modules.Jobs.Core.Enums.ContractType
member.summary: Represents the contract type of a job opportunity.

member.name: F:Hyre.Modules.Jobs.Core.Enums.ContractType.Apprentice
member.summary: When you are learning and working at the same time.

member.name: F:Hyre.Modules.Jobs.Core.Enums.ContractType.Internship
member.summary: When you are doing a job as part of your studies.

member.name: F:Hyre.Modules.Jobs.Core.Enums.ContractType.Effective
member.summary: When you are working with a contract and you are part of the company.

member.name: F:Hyre.Modules.Jobs.Core.Enums.ContractType.PartTime
member.summary: When you are working with a contract for just a specific period of time.

member.name: T:Hyre.Modules.Jobs.Core.Enums.Degree
member.summary: Represents the degree of a candidate.

member.name: F:Hyre.Modules.Jobs.Core.Enums.Degree.Bachelor
member.summary: Bachelor degree.

member.name: F:Hyre.Modules.Jobs.Core.Enums.Degree.PossGraduation
member.summary: Post-graduation.

member.name: F:Hyre.Modules.Jobs.Core.Enums.Degree.Master
member.summary: Master degree.

member.name: F:Hyre.Modules.Jobs.Core.Enums.Degree.Doctorate
member.summary: Doctorate degree.

member.name: T:Hyre.Modules.Jobs.Core.Enums.ExperienceLevel
member.summary: Represents the experience level of a candidate.

member.name: F:Hyre.Modules.Jobs.Core.Enums.ExperienceLevel.Entry
member.summary: When you are starting your career and have no experience.

member.name: F:Hyre.Modules.Jobs.Core.Enums.ExperienceLevel.Junior
member.summary: When you have beginner experience in the field.

member.name: F:Hyre.Modules.Jobs.Core.Enums.ExperienceLevel.Mid
member.summary: When you have some experience in the field.

member.name: F:Hyre.Modules.Jobs.Core.Enums.ExperienceLevel.Senior
member.summary: When you have a lot of experience in the field.

member.name: F:Hyre.Modules.Jobs.Core.Enums.ExperienceLevel.Specialist
member.summary: When you have a lot of experience in the field and are a specialist.

member.name: T:Hyre.Modules.Jobs.Core.Enums.Gender
member.summary: Represents the gender of a candidate.

member.name: F:Hyre.Modules.Jobs.Core.Enums.Gender.Male
member.summary: When you identify as a male man.

member.name: F:Hyre.Modules.Jobs.Core.Enums.Gender.Female
member.summary: When you identify as a female girl.

member.name: F:Hyre.Modules.Jobs.Core.Enums.Gender.Other
member.summary: When you identify as a non-binary person.

member.name: T:Hyre.Modules.Jobs.Core.Enums.LanguageProficiency
member.summary: Represents the language proficiency of a candidate.

member.name: F:Hyre.Modules.Jobs.Core.Enums.LanguageProficiency.Basic
member.summary: When you can work from anywhere and don't need to be in a specific location.

member.name: F:Hyre.Modules.Jobs.Core.Enums.LanguageProficiency.Intermediate
member.summary: When you can work some days from anywhere and some days from a specific location.

member.name: F:Hyre.Modules.Jobs.Core.Enums.LanguageProficiency.Advanced
member.summary: When you need to be in a specific location to work every day.

member.name: F:Hyre.Modules.Jobs.Core.Enums.LanguageProficiency.Native
member.summary: When you were born in the country and the language is your native language.

member.name: T:Hyre.Modules.Jobs.Core.Enums.LocationType
member.summary: Represents the location type of a job opportunity.

member.name: F:Hyre.Modules.Jobs.Core.Enums.LocationType.Remote
member.summary: When you can work from anywhere and don't need to be in a specific location.

member.name: F:Hyre.Modules.Jobs.Core.Enums.LocationType.Hybrid
member.summary: When you can work some days from anywhere and some days from a specific location.

member.name: F:Hyre.Modules.Jobs.Core.Enums.LocationType.OnSite
member.summary: When you need to be in a specific location to work every day.
